homeHeader.title: Trade across Borders with Seamless Dubai Customs Registration
homeHeader.description: Take advantage of the UAE's strategic location to tap into a diverse 2B+ consumer market in the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and Asia with a Dubai Custom Code (DCC). We offer expert guidance at every step of the IEC code registration process to streamline international trade, prevent legal hurdles, and foster brand trust.

leftSection_1.title: Why UAE-Based Businesses Should Register with Dubai Customs
leftSection_1.description: Take advantage of the UAE's trade-friendly facilities, world-class infrastructure, and exciting tax incentives by registering your import-export business with the appropriate DED or Free Zone authorities.

items.title: Streamline Customer Clearance
items.subTitle: Streamline Customer Clearance
items.description: Prevent costly delays, simplify documentation, and ensure seamless logistics with a 100% compliant, globally recognised import-export code.

items.title: Access Tax & Financing Benefits
items.subTitle: Access Tax & Financing Benefits
items.description: Maximise your revenue by qualifying for tax exemptions, bank loans, and government benefits- all with a DCC-issued code.

items.title: Stay Compliant with UAE Regulations
items.subTitle: Stay Compliant with UAE Regulations
items.description: Save over AED 50,000 in IEC non-compliance by securing your unique UAE-registered custom code. Minimise the risk of operational disruptions and maximise supply chain performance.

items.title: Protect Your Family's Future
items.subTitle: Protect Your Family's Future
items.description: Secure your loved one's financial future by linking your individual customs code to a successor, adding it to your Will, or drafting a strategic exit plan.

leftSection_2.title: Explore Eligible Licenses for Custom Code Registration
leftSection_2.description: Set up your business at the crossroads of Africa, Asia, and Europe for seamless import and export with the best-fit license.

items.title: Professional License

items.title: Commercial License
items.description: Perfect for trading companies involved in the import and export of diverse goods.

items.title: Industrial License
items.description: Well-suited for manufacturers or production units importing raw materials or finished products.

items.title: Intelaq License
items.description: Ideal for AE residents looking to operate an SME from home- no storefront needed.

sec1.title: Start Exporting to 190+ Countries From the UAE
sec1.description: With a registered IEC code, you can move goods through key ports and free zones with ease. We streamline the setup, so customs never slow your momentum.

sec2.title: Secure Your Importer/Exporter Code — Clear Pricing, No Surprises
sec2.description: Secure your IEC code without hidden costs or surprise add-ons. Flexible, transparent pricing that scales with your trading needs in the UAE.

leftSection_5.title: Secure Your Custom Code in 4 Simple Steps

items.title: Register Your Business
items.description: We'll kick off by ensuring your business is legally registered with the relevant Mainland or Free Zone authority.

items.title: Prepare All Documents
items.description: Next, we'll assist in collecting and attesting the relevant documentation, including a trade license, passport copies, and proof of business registration.

items.title: Submit Your Application
items.description: Our experts then submit your Customs Code application to the relevant government platform to secure approvals.

items.title: Receive Your Custom Code
items.description: Once approved, you’ll receive a unique DCC code, empowering you to trade worldwide and track goods.

leftSection_6.description: Say goodbye to costly shipment delays, supply chain disruptions, and customs penalties by registering your business with the Dubai Customs Code. We simplify the documentation process to facilitate seamless global trade.

items.title: Get Tailored Registration Solutions

items.title: Register Your Business in 1 Week
items.description: We minimise delays by pre-checking documentation, streamlining attestation, and reducing back-and-forth to secure your DCC code within 1-10 days.

items.title: Protect Personal Assets
items.description: Without a DCC-recognised custom code, you risk having your assets and accounts seized. Our experts oversee the entire process to limit liability to your business.

leftSection_7.title: Start Trading in Days, Not Months
leftSection_7.description: Avoid costly customs delays and missed opportunities with a registered importer-exporter code. We ensure seamless approvals to minimise operational disruptions.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is a customs code in the UAE used for?
items.answer: It is a unique identification number that allows you to trade across and beyond the Emirates legally.

items.question: How do I register for a Customs Code in Dubai?
items.answer: You can receive your unique Customs Code by obtaining a valid trade license and submitting your application alongside the relevant documents.

items.question: How long does it take to secure an IEC code in the UAE?
items.answer: Generally, the approval process takes 1-10 business days, depending on your jurisdiction, the nature of import-export products, and document readiness.

items.question: Are there any prohibited items for import and export in Dubai?
items.answer: Yes, Dubai restricts the trade of narcotics, pirated content, counterfeit currency, gambling devices, and other products that are against Islamic values.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me renew my import-export code?
items.answer: Yes, our expert consultants can help you register for and renew your IEC code to ensure you’re 100% compliant.
